text.div:
Depression Screening and Follow up Given

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G8431 Screening for depression is documented as being positive and a follow-up plan is documented

name: Depression Screening and Follow up Given
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
